Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58

Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.event.gameEvents.lobby

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent
    Event sent by the VirtualView to the Controller to make a connection request for a player.
    CC_NewGameResponseEvent
    Event sent to the controller when a game has just finished.
    CV_ConnectionRejectedErrorGameEvent
    Event sent by the Controller to the client saying that the connection has not established.
    CV_NewGameRequestEvent
    Event sent by the Controller to the client asking for a new game after one has just finished.
    CV_ReconnectionRejectedErrorGameEvent
    Event sent by the Controller that occurs when a reconnection after a game has just finished was not successful.
    CV_RoomSizeRequestGameEvent
    Event sent by the Controller to the client asking to input the size of the room to create.
    CV_RoomUpdateGameEvent
    Event sent by the controller to the client when the player or another player enters in the room he is in.
    VC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent
    Event sent by the client to the server to request a connection.
    VC_NewGameResponseEvent
    Event sent by the client to the server responding to a CV_NewGameRequestEvent saying if he wants or not to play another game.
    VC_RoomSizeResponseGameEvent
    Event sent by the client to the server responding to a CV_RoomSizeRequestGameEvent.
